Elm Tree Montessori
Why Montessori?

What is Montessori?

A carefully prepared environment which guarantees exposure to materials and experiences. The need for freedom within limits. The Montessoi method of education is designed to take full advantage of the childrenâ€™s desire to learn and their unique ability to develop their own capabilities.

In our Montessori pre-school, children are welcomed into the prepared environment, which is divided into 4 main sections.
